body: Every author starting to make NTR :))
still good yet with bad script...it's okau
If this doujin not coming in timeline, i guess i'm gonna forget this author still exist. so much longer to wait this author doujins to get translated. i almost forgot how long, one year? two year?

Fan of this guy since his boing boing series. It's been years not having any new translated content of his to read (seriously why is no one translating his work? And instead rather translate a low quality content than a satisfying tankoubon) and is now seriously disappointed how his latest work is an NTR instead of an harem netori he is loved and known for.
F*CK THISSS... one of the authors I admire the MOST is starting to make some NTR ..!!??
